Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2011 03:13AM mamatoboyz wrote: Thank you! I thought that I would be more calm the closer I got to the biopsy day, but I am a mess today! Soooo nervous! My mind is all over the place. When I went in for my second mammo the tech was so casual "so do you have a history of BC in your family then?" Uh no! "Well it could just be early BC". I started to cry & she said "Oh my gosh, are you OK?" I know they do it all the time, but really...its our bodies they are dealing with, our lives, right? They told me that my Dr. won't have the results for me until April 14th so I'll have to wait until next Thursday to hear anything!!! OMGosh!!!
Posts.Title: Biopsy tomorrow...can pleomorphic be benign? mamatoboyz wonderfullymade

Posts.Content: mamatoboyz wrote: I have my stereotactic biopsy tomorrow and they didn't give me any instructions! Help! Deodorant? No deodorant? Advil? Anything? On my second mammogram, they saw pleomorphic calcs and from everything I've read...we'll simply...its just not great! & I've done 3 weeks of reading!!!! Does clustered pleomorphic calcifications mean bad news? I've been in a good place for a good week and just lost it last night; I'm going to be a mess tomorrow! Any thoughts would be helpful and any instructions on that biopsy tomorrow would be great too!!! Hugs to everyone!!!!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy tomorrow...can pleomorphic be benign? mamatoboyz wonderfullymade
